storyInfo: A ceremony comes to a close. Federico accepts his mission from the Pope, and heads to the hidden abbey out in the wilderness.

attributes.text: A land of freedom, happiness and order, one of the few left in this chaotic world.
Have you ever known doubt, my child?
How was our city built, how did it grow, and how did it prosper?
Why is there only one Laterano? Why is it called the eternal paradise?
If the fires of war burn once more, and peace falls into ruin before our eyes—
Will the world continue to tolerate Paradise?

attributes.content: They are here, Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Are you sure about this? There is no precedent for it, aside from the canonization of the popes. It's risky.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: You are correct. I could find no such record in our millennium of history.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: But that is of no concern.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: What is of concern is the warning I received.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: What is it about, specifically?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I would answer your question honestly, if I could.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Our glowing faith has warned us that danger is near. But no one knows what it is, or how it will arrive.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I only see a list of names.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: First on the list is the main character of today's performance.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: That's why you proposed canonizing him?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Still the title of 'Saint' is special, reserved for the holy ones who built Laterano.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I hold the same title.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Th-That's different! You're the Pope, sir.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: You're conceding a significant amount of power. He will have the right to participate in a multitude of matters, even policy-making... this is no small thing!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Easy, Giovanni. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: And, as I said, there is more than one name on the list.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: What? Are you proposing that all of them be canonized?!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: That's absu—I mean, against the rules!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Don't be so quick to judge, Giovanni. We need to find them first.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I saw some familiar names. Do you know who's on it?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: In that case, I'll let it remain a secret for a little longer.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Giovanni.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I think I'll visit these friends after the ceremony.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Why are there so many balloons?
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: There's even a pie throwing competition on that street up ahead. I had to take a detour because of all the pies on the ground... is there some sort of festival on?
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: No idea. Heard it's a ceremony or something, but I don't know the specifics.
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Who cares, at the end of the day? Let's just enjoy the occasion, like we always do.
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Say, do you think I could fly if I tied myself to these balloons?
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: You don't have a prayer, even if you lost twenty pounds.
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: Don't say that! Maybe I could take off my jacket. It's a pretty warm day...
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Hey, look, new balloons!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Here, hold my jacket, I've got to try this!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Hey! Be careful!
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: Whoooooooa! I'm flying!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Hey, how do I stop climbing?
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Oh no! I forgot I'm scared of heights!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Pardon.
Hey! Don't go! Help!
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: Hm?
Help! Let me down!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Man, that hurt... but thanks.
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran
Spirited Lateran
attributes.content: My balloons...

attributes.name: Spirited Lateran
attributes.content: You popped them all? Did you really have to be so cruel?
It was the logical solution, given the circumstances.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I guess... but couldn't you have left me a couple?
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: He got you down, stop whining. Don't mind this idiot, sir.
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: Where did you get that outfit? It looks cool.
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: I can't say.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do you mean? Was it a gift?
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: Looks like a work uniform. There's something familiar about it...
attributes.name: Spirited Lateran

attributes.content: Where do you get a uniform like that? I'm applying!
attributes.name: Joyous Lateran

attributes.content: ...I'm not sure it's a standard uniform.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You can submit your curriculum vitae to the Curia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: '....They led the Sankta. They built a city and named it Laterano.'
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: 'And when disaster looms once more, a new revelation shall dawn upon the Sankta, and a new guide shall lead forth...'
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: 'The Paradise of the Sankta shall remain eternal, as witnessed by the world.'
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: We bear witness.
attributes.name: Legatus

attributes.content: We bear witness.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: We bear witness.
attributes.name: Cleric

attributes.content: Ite, missa est.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: You can raise your head now, my child.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: No... a different name is appropriate here.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Raise your head and stand by my side, Saint Federico Giallo, the first Chosen of Laterano who does not come from the ranks of the popes.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: A measured reaction. Not a fan of the balloons?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: What is the duty of a Saint? What is the disaster that looms? Does it call for immediate action?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I need to know the details in order to formulate a plan.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: An appropriate question, but not one I am able to answer.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The warning I received was as cryptic as it was direct. It does not provide for a specific answer.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Each era has its own trials and tribulations, for which we can only prepare to the best of our ability. It is certain, however, that you have been chosen because It believes that you have the ability to respond to the unknown.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: ...I don't understand.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There is no hurry. We have time.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Right now, there are other things we can talk about... this garb suits you, Federico.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Makes all the cardinals' bickering over the cut and color worthwhile.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I didn't think that was a cardinal's duty.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Let's not be so strict. People can't help but focus on that which draws their interest.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I've seen your resume, Federico. I can tell that you are an outstanding executor.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: The Commandments do not bind your thoughts as they do others, eh?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Rules can be broken, if necessary.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Of course. I can't bring myself to disagree.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: You judge matters by your own standards. That is why you always carry out your missions effectively, if somewhat unorthodoxly.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: I have a mission for you. I had intended on going myself, but there are other matters that require my attention... now, I've found someone who can go in my stead.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: It will not be an easy task. Expect unexpected complications, the likes of which you have never seen.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: But I believe you are up to it. I want to see why He chose you.
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Will you go, Federico?
attributes.name: Yvangelista XI

attributes.content: Executor Federico, ready for assignment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What is your command?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What are you looking at, Arturia?
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: The flowers, Excellency.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: This is the only place in the monastery where they grow. I'm glad I made it in time for bloom season. It's a view worth savoring.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Clément would be happy to hear it.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: It has been a long time since anyone came to see the flowers that he cared for. They used to grow all around the abbey.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: This is all that is left.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: A shame. I understand there is a beautiful story behind them.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: There was.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: What about now?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Perhaps there still is. But my eyes have grown weak. Flowers are no longer pure enjoyment for me. I've grown too old, spent too much time here.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Flowers cannot fill an empty stomach, just as your music can soothe pain but not avert aging.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: I know things don't always go according to plan. Perhaps this was inevitable the moment our call for help reached Laterano.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Now...
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Only the bitter fruit remains.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Bitter fruit. Even the name itself leaves a bitterness on the tip of the tongue that does not go away. I rather like it, actually.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Poor soil does not bear sweet fruit.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Poor soil. Yes, poor soil.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: But it's home for people like us.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: I thought we would find a better, more peaceful life.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: We had walls that protected us from wind and rain, we had faith unwavering. Our longing for a peaceful life won out over our longing for home.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: All that was left was to find a quiet corner of the world where we could live in peace.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: But now...
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: The old man's emaciated face twitches slightly.
It is as though he is mustering the strength to tear apart that which threatens to crush him beneath his loose skin. His words are replaced by a string of coughs and gasps.
How many years has it been? Fifty? Sixty? More?
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: When disaster came from the sea, when we rejected the Inquisition's demands and left Iberia to settle here... I've seen children born, and then buried those same children.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Life has become hard.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Life is always hard.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Yes, you're right...
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Look at the living. To where do they belong? I can't tell.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Are they of Iberia, or of Laterano?
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: We've come too far in too long...
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Arturia.
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Am I still a Lateran, after all these years?
attributes.name: Gaunt Old Man

attributes.content: Only you know the answer, Abbot Stefano Torregrossa.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I hope I still am.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Then you are.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You spoke the truth, Arturia.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: There's no need to test me anymore.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: A misunderstanding. I never intended to probe your secrets.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I permitted you to stay because these doors are open to all who bear no ill intentions.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But I still don't know what you are seeking, Arturia.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: What if I said I seek nothing?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I take it you don't believe it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Then let me put it this way. Pay no heed to me. I promise I will not interfere with anything here, nor with your decisions.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I'm simply a traveler, drawn to this place by the stories here, praying that the ending is a good one.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Should I swear in the name of my halo?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You're a cunning one, Arturia.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But I believe your words.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: The old man falls silent again.
Do all who grow old grow dry and stiff? The lines on his face, once so beloved, now cast only lethargy.
The eyes have become clouded by the decades that they have seen.
The face should have been warmer, gentler, more Lateran.
The Holy City never answered, all these years, but I never stopped praying.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: My faith taught me to love, to be kind. It did not teach me to abandon our brothers and sisters, our loyal friends.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: To abandon the few for the happiness of the many...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: The devoted would call it a shameful betrayal.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Do you?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I don't have that answer, Arturia.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Where does the believer go, if faith has betrayed itself?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Here's the stuff.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: Get it salted and dried quickly. It should last the winter.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: I'll get someone on it!
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Gratias. This meat will buy us some time...
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: Finding game was harder than I thought, with the weather is getting colder.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: Don't say that!
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Thanks to you, there will be meat on the table for the children tonight... don't apologize.
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Ha. Okay, forget what I said. Make them something good for dinner.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: I would love to, but we've got to ration.
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Where's Hyman? She didn't get hurt, did she?
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Don't worry, she's fine.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Don't hide anything, okay? An injury is no small thing.
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: No problem, we'll come back if we do need anything.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: It's getting late. I should go.
attributes.name: Weathered Hunter

attributes.content: Hey, Gerald!
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Everyone's been talking about Laterano. They mean no harm; they're just a little anxious.
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Please, don't mind it if someone lets something slip.
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I-I see, that's good... yes...
attributes.name: Gaunt Monastery Inhabitant

attributes.content: Thanks for coming, Raimund.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Let's go. We're not needed here. Is Hyman back yet?
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Haven't seen her all day. Davy led a group out to look for her. I'll join them later.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: We have a scout team ready. We'll have concrete intel when they get back tonight.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Good. Carry on.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Brother Gerald...
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Are we really going to accept things as they are right now?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Calm down, Raimund.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: You know we never had of a choice.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: So we're compromising?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: What are we? What have all these years been for? What's the difference between us and them? We're just—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Raimund!
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: That's enough.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: No buts.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I know you don't like it, Raimund.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: There's still time. If there's someone you want to see, go and see them.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.text: Ingestion of food for the organism's survival.
It is the basis of life, and the fundamental instinct of all animals.
Activities for the sake of survival.
The most legitimate desire there is.

attributes.content: I wanted to try to persuade you, but now is not really the time.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: You're weak. Too many things interfere with our thoughts, warp our judgment, preventing us from following the guidance of our faith.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: You can no longer hear me, can you?
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: There is no answer.
The priest's voice mixes with a strange sound, echoing through the underground space.
The sound of eating.
The sound of ripping food apart and swallowing it.
Life that has lost its original form grows in the shadows.
It's almost winter. The sun has become a rare sight.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: This building is like a remote island. It has held out long enough. It can no longer hold out.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: See the gaps in the walls, where the draught comes through.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: There is little fuel left. Many will suffer in the cold without winter supplies.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: Of course, we're not entirely helpless.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: There are a couple of small Originium veins nearby, aren't there?
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: Originium can be mined there for energy generation, as you have done for many years.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: But it's dangerous. Everyone knows the risk of Oripathy infection.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: Who would take such a risk if they had a choice? Oripathy is a death sentence on an island like this.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: You left your homes and came here. You accepted the most dangerous jobs in order to find a place to call your new home.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: You're an indispensable part of this abbey.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: You still can't hear me, can you?
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: I must admit...
attributes.name: Gentle Priest

attributes.content: I feel a little sad.
attributes.name: Gentle Priest
Sankta Girl
attributes.content: Hello? Anyone? Any—

attributes.name: Sankta Girl
attributes.content: Whoa!
What's with all the broken glass?
attributes.name: Sankta Girl

attributes.content: Fortuna? Good timing.
attributes.name: Gaunt Man

attributes.content: Give me a hand with this window frame, will you? The wind broke the window. I'm trying to plug it up.
attributes.name: Gaunt Man

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Didn't we fix this a couple of days ago? I remember my teeth chattering in the cold while listening to Father Stefano's sermon.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Should I get some tape?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'm afraid tape won't do. The pieces are all over the place, and I don't think I can put it back. Sorry...
attributes.name: Gaunt Man

attributes.content: Why apologize to me, Patruus Clément? It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What should we do? Find something to block it up. The wind's rather cold... should I find some unused fabric?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Don't waste it, save it for clothes. It's getting cold.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: There should be some planks left from when Gerald took those old houses apart. I'll go look for them.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: That will do it for the frame. Thanks, Fortuna.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: What were you here for anyway?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Oh! I wanted to see if there's anything to eat because I missed lunch. It's all Fina's fault...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What's my fault?
attributes.name: Solemn Girl

attributes.content: Fina!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Listening to you talk behind my back.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I'm just telling it like it is! That wouldn't have taken so long if you didn't keep going on and on about it.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It's because you were dumb enough to get scammed!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I told you to be careful of Lemuen! She's been talking to everyone, pretending to care. Who knows what she's really after?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: You've been absent-minded lately. Did she say something to you?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: No! No one said anything to me! I'm not being absent-minded!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Yes, you are.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: We're all Sankta, Tuna. You can't fool me.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: So is Lemuen. You know she has no ill intentions. Why won't you trust her?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Why do you hate people from Laterano so much? We were Laterans too, weren't we?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Father Stefano says we can go back soon. Why did we lock up the Lateran emissaries?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Why don't we go back?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Because Raimund and the others can't go with us! Isn't that reason enough?
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: You want to leave them behind? Well, I don't!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: That's not what I mean!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Then what do you mean?!
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The Abbot has his reasons. Say no more.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: I'll find some planks to board up the window... you two calm down.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Can't you sense my thoughts, Fina?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I can, Tuna.
attributes.name: Delfina
Delfina
attributes.content: But I...
Never mind. I lost my cool. I know that wasn't what you meant.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: I was wrong too.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You always have that gun with you. You got it from your dad, right? I thought it didn't work anymore.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: It doesn't. Maybe it's a parts problem. And I don't know how to use a gun myself...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But I'm not carrying it to use it anyway.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I always thought it was a decorative accessory.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: Partly.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Holding the gun like this is like praying.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: That's what Dad said when he gave it to me. He said it was a Sankta practice.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I don't know about any practices like that.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: My grandma's gun is in a canyon.
attributes.name: Delfina

attributes.content: We can share, Fina.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'll try to get it fixed, then we can use it together.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Now, let us pray.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: The planks should be here somewhere...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Aha. There.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: That should be enough. I could fix the outside windows too, if there are any leftover.
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: And fuel...
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Not much fuel left. *sigh*
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Who goes there?!
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: ...No one?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: Am I seeing things?
attributes.name: Clément

attributes.content: The terrain is so strange. Do you still call this a desert? There's a canyon below?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Mind your step.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I never knew you were such a gentleman, Richele.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Nothing good ever happens comes from you complimenting me...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Don't be so uptight. Your bank account is safe this time.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Is that the nomadic abbey we're looking for?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I think so.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What do we do? Knock on the front door?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You think someone will answer?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What do you think, Federico?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Approach.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Roger. Er, should we do a quick briefing first?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Target building has been identified. It is a large mobile complex built jointly by Iberia and Laterano in 1011, official name Sanctilaminium Ambrosii.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Originally controlled by Iberia, it disappeared after straying from its route 61 years ago.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Laterano received a request for help from the abbey one month ago and sent two nuncios to investigate.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Straightforward enough up to this point.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So how did we end up losing contact with our nuncios and bringing in big guns like you two?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: My mission is to discover the whereabouts of Cardinal Aide Lemuen and Legatus Oren Argiolas, and to guarantee their safety.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I am also to ensure that the abbey is able to function normally and avoid casualties.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: So His Holiness wants you take it easy?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, I signed up for Lemuen. I couldn't care less what happens to Oren.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Your personal feelings are irrelevant.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Target status is unclear, and we are unable to determine if the inhabitants of the building are hostile.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: What do we do, then? Infiltrate and investigate?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I suggest we take the most direct path and finish this quickly.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If they are deceased, I will return their bones to Laterano.
attributes.name: Federico
